short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ML-powered speech recognition in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for speech recognition. It runs locally without sending data to a cloud service. It supports speech recognition from files, browser tab, and microphone. You can export the data from the extension.
